Description_lang: A master of wind and war, Mulverick is one of the few Frostwolf orcs to conquer the art of rylak riding.
AuraDescription_lang: A master of wind and war, Mulverick is one of the few Frostwolf orcs to conquer the art of rylak riding.

description_blz.en_US: A master of wind and war, Mulverick is one of the few Frostwolf orcs to conquer the art of rylak riding.
description_blz.es_MX: Un maestro del viento y la guerra, Mulverick es uno de los pocos orcos Lobo Gélido en dominar el arte de montar rylaks.
description_blz.pt_BR: Mulverick é um mestre do vento e da guerra, e é um dos poucos orcs do Lobo do Gelo a dominar a arte de montar rylaks.
description_blz.de_DE: Mulverick, ein Meister des Windes und des Krieges, ist einer der wenigen Orcs des Frostwolfklans, der das Rylakreiten beherrscht.
description_blz.en_GB: A master of wind and war, Mulverick is one of the few Frostwolf orcs to conquer the art of rylak riding.
description_blz.es_ES: Mulverick, maestro del viento y de la guerra, es uno de los pocos orcos Lobo Gélido que ha logrado dominar la monta de rylaks.
description_blz.fr_FR: Maître dans les arts de la guerre et du vol, Mulverick est l’un des rares Loups-de-Givre à avoir conquis l’art de la monte de rylaks.
description_blz.it_IT: Signore dell'aria e della guerra, Mulverick è uno dei pochi Orchi Lupi Bianchi ad aver appreso l'arte di cavalcare i rylak.
description_blz.ru_RU: Мастер военного искусства, покоритель ветров Маэстр, – один из немногих орков клана Северного Волка, которым удалось постичь искусство езды на рилаках.
description_blz.ko_KR: 바람과 전쟁의 달인인 멀베릭은 서리늑대 오크 중에서는 드물게 라일라크 타는 법을 습득했습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 御風與戰爭的大師，穆維里克是少數幾名精通萊拉克騎術的霜狼獸人之一。
description_blz.zh_CN: 作为狂风与战争的大师，穆维里克是少数掌握了双头飞龙骑术的霜狼兽人。
